    publications

    Controllable light-induced conic structures in silicon nanowire arrays by metal-assisted chemical etching

    S. Zhang, X. Wang, H. Liu, W. Shen, Nanotechnology, vol. 25, p. 025602, 2013.

    Facile synthesis and photoluminescence mechanism of graphene quantum dots

    P. Yang, L. Zhou, S. Zhang, N. Wan, W. Pan, W. Shen, Journal of Applied Physics, vol. 116, p. 244306, 2014.

    Gas adsorption properties of ZSM-5 zeolites heated to extreme temperatures

    M. Perez-Page, J. Makel, K. Guan, S. Zhang, J. Tringe, R. Castro, P. Stroeve, Ceramics International, vol. 42, p. 15423, 2016.

    Response to extreme temperatures of mesoporous silica MCM-41: porous structure transformation simulation and modification of gas adsorption properties

    S. Zhang, M. Perez-Page, K. Guan, E. Yu, J. Tringe, R. Castro, R. Faller, P. Stroeve, Langmuir, vol. 32, p. 11422, 2016.

    Atomistic modeling of La3+ doping segregation effect on nanocrystalline yttria-stabilized zirconia

    S. Zhang, H. Sha, R. Castro, R. Faller, Physical Chemistry Chemical Physics, vol. 20, p. 13215, 2018.

    Energetic design of grain boundary networks for toughening of nanocrystalline oxides

    A. Bokov, S. Zhang, L. Feng, S. Dillon, R. Faller, R. Castro, Journal of the European Ceramic Society, vol. 38, p. 4260, 2018.

    Helium interactions with alumina formed by atomic layer deposition show potential for mitigating problems with excess helium in spent nuclear fuel

    S. Zhang, E. Yu, S. Gates, W. Cassata, J. Makel, A. Thron, C. Bartel, A. Weimer, R. Faller, P. Stroeve, J. Tringe, Journal of Nuclear Materials, vol. 499, p. 301, 2018.

    Molecular investigation of gas adsorption, separation, and transport on carbon nanoscrolls: A combined grand canonical Monte Carlo and molecular dynamics study

    H. Sha, S. Zhang, R. Faller, Carbon, vol. 132, p. 401, 2018.

    Computational Modelling of Atomic Layer Etching of Chlorinated Germanium Surfaces by Argon

    S. Zhang, Y. Huang, G. Tetiker, S. Sriraman, A. Paterson, R. Faller, Physical Chemistry Chemical Physics, vol. 21, p. 5898, 2019.

    Computational and experimental studies on novel materials for fission gas capture

    S. Zhang, H. Sha, E. Yu, M. Page, R. Castro, P. Stroeve, J. Tringe, R. Faller, In the proceedings of Proceedings of the 18th International Conference on Environmental Degradation of Materials in Nuclear Power Systems--Water Reactors, p. 1039, 2019.

    Can a PbCrO4 Photoanode Perform as Well as Isoelectronic BiVO4?

    A. Lindberg, W. Wang, S. Zhang, G. Galli, K. Choi, ACS Applied Energy Materials, 2020.

    Porous Organic Frameworks Featured by Distinct Confining Fields for the Selective Hydrogenation of Biomass-Derived Ketones

    Y. Yang, D. Deng, S. Zhang, Q. Meng, Z. Li, Z. Wang, H. Sha, R. Faller, Z. Bian, X. Zou, G. Zhu, Y. Yuan, Advanced Materials, vol. 32, p. 1908234, 2020.
